Package org.attribyte.snook.auth

Class HMACCookieAuthenticator<T>

java.lang.Object
org.attribyte.snook.auth.HMACCookieAuthenticator<T>
All Implemented Interfaces:
Authenticator<T>
Direct Known Subclasses:
HMACCookieLoginAuthenticator
public abstract class HMACCookieAuthenticator<T> extends Object implements Authenticator<T>
An authenticator that validates an HMACToken sent as a cookie value.
